traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Waeloquay has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Waeloquay fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Water Form
entries: Waeloquay can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 26 (4d8 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whelm {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in Waeloquay's space must make a DC 22 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 21 (3d8 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it also has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe, unless it can breathe water. If the save is successful, the target is pushed out of Waeloquay's space. Waeloquay can grapple one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of Waeloquay's turns, each target {@condition grappled} by it takes 21 (3d8 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of Waeloquay can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 22 Strength check and succeeding.

legendary.name: Flow
entries: Waeloquay moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Crush (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature that Waeloquay is grappling takes 44 ({@damage 8d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Pummel (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Waeloquay makes a Slam attack with advantage.
